alert.note: Alert for Arkansas; Jefferson; Prairie (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 21 at 10:14AM CDT by NWS Little Rock
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of south central Prairie, southeastern Lonoke, north central Jefferson and northwestern Arkansas Counties through 1100 AM CDT... At 1014 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near England, or 19 miles south of Lonoke, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Stuttgart... England... Humphrey... Humnoke... Keo... Brummitt... Wabbaseka... Allport... Coy... Tucker... Gethsemane... Tomberlin... Ferda... Bayou Meteo State Game Area... MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
